name: Ellie Code Snippet
author: Ellie

sections.description: Welcome to Ellie! This plugin helps to insert your Ellie code snippet to your WordPress site.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

You can install this plugin directly from wp-admin by going to Plugins and searching for Ellie.

You can also install this manually by uploading via the Plugins page of WordPress or you can upload the .zip file directly. Which you would upload ellie-code-snippet.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.

Setting up the plugin
1. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
2. Go to the new menu item of ‘Ellie Code Snippet’
3. Copy your Ellie Account ID by signing into your Ellie account and going to settings
4. Paste in your Ellie Account ID under the ‘Ellie Code Snippet’ page inside your WP Admin Area.
5. Hit Save Changes

That’s it – you’re done! Manage your Ellie conversations by signing into https://GetEllie.com
